(UNITURN mérőállomás táp szerelőlap)
(cmd line: -i usb_tavtarto.txt -t)
(plot cmd: -i usb_tavtarto.txt -t -p)
(szerszám beállítás)

t1 m d3 h19

yxz
t1
s50
f700

#c1 = 0.375
c1 = 0.5
z1 = 3.5
(vágás fogásmélység egy menetben)
#c2 = 0.675
c2 = 1
ujg = 0.2


y1 = 0
y2 = 8.3
y3 = 10.7
y4 = 3.4
y5 = 15.6
oy = 22

(1. körvonal)
b outline 0,0 size46.25,19 z$z1 c$c2 g1,2,2.5
l 0,$y2 46.25,$y3
h 23.125,$y4 z$z1 c$c1 d3 jg0.1
h 23.125,$y5 z$z1 c$c1 d3 jg0.1

(2.)

y1 = add($y1,$oy)
y2 = add($y2,$oy)
y3 = add($y3,$oy)
y4 = add($y4,$oy)
y5 = add($y5,$oy)

b outline 0,$y1 size46.25,19 z$z1 c$c2 g1,2,2.5 nl1,1,1,0
l 0,$y2 46.25,$y3
h 23.125,$y4 z$z1 c$c1 d3 jg0.1
h 23.125,$y5 z$z1 c$c1 d3 jg0.1

y1 = add($y1,$oy)
y2 = add($y2,$oy)
y3 = add($y3,$oy)
y4 = add($y4,$oy)
y5 = add($y5,$oy)

b outline 0,$y1 size46.25,19 z$z1 c$c2 g1,2,2.5 nl1,1,1,0
l 0,$y2 46.25,$y3
h 23.125,$y4 z$z1 c$c1 d3 jg0.1
h 23.125,$y5 z$z1 c$c1 d3 jg0.1

y1 = add($y1,$oy)
y2 = add($y2,$oy)
y3 = add($y3,$oy)
y4 = add($y4,$oy)
y5 = add($y5,$oy)

b outline 0,$y1 size46.25,19 z$z1 c$c2 g1,2,2.5 nl1,1,1,0
l 0,$y2 46.25,$y3
h 23.125,$y4 z$z1 c$c1 d3 jg0.1
h 23.125,$y5 z$z1 c$c1 d3 jg0.1

(5.)

y1 = add($y1,$oy)
y2 = add($y2,$oy)
y3 = add($y3,$oy)
y4 = add($y4,$oy)
y5 = add($y5,$oy)

b outline 0,$y1 size46.25,19 z$z1 c$c2 g1,2,2.5 nl1,1,1,0
l 0,$y2 46.25,$y3
h 23.125,$y4 z$z1 c$c1 d3 jg0.1
h 23.125,$y5 z$z1 c$c1 d3 jg0.1

y1 = add($y1,$oy)
y2 = add($y2,$oy)
y3 = add($y3,$oy)
y4 = add($y4,$oy)
y5 = add($y5,$oy)

b outline 0,$y1 size46.25,19 z$z1 c$c2 g1,2,2.5 nl1,1,1,0
l 0,$y2 46.25,$y3
h 23.125,$y4 z$z1 c$c1 d3 jg0.1
h 23.125,$y5 z$z1 c$c1 d3 jg0.1

y1 = add($y1,$oy)
y2 = add($y2,$oy)
y3 = add($y3,$oy)
y4 = add($y4,$oy)
y5 = add($y5,$oy)

b outline 0,$y1 size46.25,19 z$z1 c$c2 g1,2,2.5 nl1,1,1,0
l 0,$y2 46.25,$y3
h 23.125,$y4 z$z1 c$c1 d3 jg0.1
h 23.125,$y5 z$z1 c$c1 d3 jg0.1

y1 = add($y1,$oy)
y2 = add($y2,$oy)
y3 = add($y3,$oy)
y4 = add($y4,$oy)
y5 = add($y5,$oy)

b outline 0,$y1 size46.25,19 z$z1 c$c2 g1,2,2.5 nl1,1,1,0
l 0,$y2 46.25,$y3
h 23.125,$y4 z$z1 c$c1 d3 jg0.1
